  • public class MCPatternBlock
extends MCPatternBlock2D
    A generic class to work without Forge or other dependencies
    Author:
    Alexandre DUPONCHEL

        x - The X position of the block
        y - The Y position of the block
        z - The Z position of the block

        Creates a new block
        Parameters:
        id - The minecraft ID of the block, see Minecraft data values
        dataValue - The specifif data value of a block
        x - The X position of the block
        y - The Y position of the block
        z - The Z position of the block
